item.description:
3 stages of performers throughout the day. Many styles including folk, blues, jazz, big band, zydeco, latin, bluegrass, African, Irish, Cambodian, and more!

Cost: free
Hours: 12 noon - 6:45 PM
Web site: http://www.breadandro...

They have food vendors.

Also a petting zoo, trolley tour, and walking tour.

I have a meeting place and time(s).
Let's meet at the corner of Common St. and Lawrence St., which is one corner of the common.
I'm not sure if I'll make it by the event starting time of noon, so I'll meet people at 1:15 PM.
If you want to get there for the start you can make a quick check of the meeting place at noon just in case. Even if I make it at 12 I'll also check at 1:15.
I'll be wearing my black baseball cap that has "NEIL" on it.

Assitant organizer Neil
item.name: Bread and Roses Festival
